fields.options:
GUIDE LINES FOR EVALUATION

  • In Self Appraisal Section please provide specific & precise information on your achievements & learning
  • KPI Assessment carries 100% weightage & Competency Assessment carries 100% weightage
  • KPI Assessment & Competency Assessment should be done on the 4 point Assessment
  • Scale of Assessment: 4 To 1 (4 being the highest and 1 being the lowest)
4 3 2 1
Excellent Meets Expectation Average Needs Improvement & Under Performance

fields.options:
1. Initiative Is creative in coming up with ideas and solutions and proactive in looking for improvements and more effective ways of operating.
2. Customer Focus Understands and responds quickly to the changing needs of both external and internal customers
3. Professional Proficiency Understands complex operational issues quickly and takes appropriate action,executes well.
4. Punctuality and Promptness Exactness in keeping time in attending office,recording and reporting movements,leaves,activities,etc.
5. Integrity Professional and personal integrity, Sincerity towards responsibilities, Conscientiousness towards duty.
6. Culture Behaviour in organizations Emphasis on People, Seriousness, Simplicity.
7. Resourcefulness Adapts to rapidly changing conditions; mediates differences,demonstrates high level of initiative, drive and persistence and involvement.
8. Team Work Co-ordination within a team,sensitive response,develops rapport,trust,solicits interpersonal feedback.
9. Communication Express ideas and concerns clearly,Proficient and confident in presentation,Flexible and effective oral,writing skills.
10. Work Planning Ability to plan, prioritize and effectively manage tasks assigned.

fields.description: Rating: - 4 – Outstanding,3 - Excellent,2 - Good,1 - Needs improvement/under performance
fields.label: Goal Setting - Current Year

fields.options:
KPIs (Goal Setting) shall include the following (There are some examples)

For Sales Team

1. Territory – wise targets.

2. Targets set for the year on specific products to focus to achieve the desired product mix at regional level.

3. Reduction in outstanding Debtors as a percentage of sales.

4. Any recovery /Reconciliation of specific sales account

5. Appointment of new dealers/Galleries or covering new territory

6. Coordinating and conducting meets and training for dealers and their staff. (With tentative schedule)

7. Organizing architects /interior designer’s meet at regional level.

For Supply Chain Team

1. Reduction in the transportation and handling cost of import consignments

2. Reducing the service and lead times for supplies.

3. Starting to give feed back to sales team, once the order is placed, till the supplies are over.

4. Developing new vendors for critical supplies

For Production Team

1. To increase productivity and quality on measurable terms

2. To adhere to the production schedule and start giving EDDs for all SOCs.

3. To reduce the inventory and operate within set norms.

4. To start new products and facilities on time

5. To judiciously implement the CAPEXs for the year with in the scheduled time.

For Accounts and Finance Team

1. To issue C/N or D/N on time

2. To assist and reconcile all the Creditors and Debtors.

3. To make overseas payment on time.

4. To monitor the LC payment receivables start new products and facilities on time

5. To claim the retention, PBG & ABGs on time.
